name: Donuts Runner
description:
The police are very serious guys, but even sometimes they want to have fun. You know, they love to scatter donuts on the road and run after them until they fall... Really?

Donuts Runner is a 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control a cute fat cop. Run as far as possible while collecting as many donuts as possible. Beat your own records on the path to excellence and prove to everyone that you are the most fun cop in the area

Game Features:
- Visual style
- 3D World
- Difficulty
